subject: Management
title: Scenario Planning
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Scenario Planning.

hook.text: Shell Oil survived the 1973 crisis because they had already rehearsed that exact scenario.

buildup.text: Scenario planning doesn't predict the future. It prepares you for multiple futures.

discovery.text: Build three scenarios: optimistic, pessimistic, and most likely. Plan responses for each.

twist.text: The value isn't the plan. It's the mental flexibility you build by thinking through alternatives.

climax.text: When crisis hits, you've already thought about it. Reaction time shrinks dramatically.

punchline.text: Rehearse the future so it doesn't surprise you.

quiz.question: What is the main benefit of scenario planning?
options: Building mental flexibility to respond faster to different futures
Perfectly predicting which outcome will occur
